title: Where can I find Disney's Arjun movie?
selftext:
I'm trying to find it with English sub or dubs but I can only find Hindi and French.  I don't speak hindi, and I'm not actually Indian.  I'm American and married to an Indian, and trying to find more Indian cartoons and books I can share with our kids. 

My husband is from karnataka and doesn't really speak hindi very well, so he cannot help much here either. 


Link below to film:
https://m.imdb.com/title/tt2404027/
comments:
Here - https://dignes.monster/movies/play/arjun-the-warrior-prince-2012?mid=17&sid=&sec=3fa011852a6e039897203253c8a910df1e0052eb&t=1680997196

You can choose between different languages and sources for the subtitles.

https://youtu.be/lLiIWaJ6pi0 slightly low quality and Spanish subs but it is watchable

Another version on youtube https://youtu.be/Fes-kkM31nI if you want to buy or rent it. This is the official version so should have English subs.
